short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces the text 'remember me' with 'AVENGE ME'.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This replaces the words "Remember Me" with "AVENGE ME" on all websites.

Source code available here: https://github.com/cr3ative/avenge-me

This is a bodge of the fantastic open-source: https://github.com/panicsteve/cloud-to-butt
